document.full_text: u.s. supreme court justices sharply questioned on tuesday whether a state may prohibit the use of prescription drug records for marketing, expressing concerns that it violated free-speech rights.
document.title: u.s. top court questions state drug data limits
lines_and_colors: u.s. supreme court justices sharply questioned on tuesday whether a state may prohibit the use of prescription drug records for marketing, expressing concerns that it violated free-speech rights.
